description: This is a market on whether Gambit eSports will cover a 10 round handicap against Entropiq in their ESL Pro League Season 14 best of three series on September 4, 2021, at 10:45 AM ET. This market will resolve to “Gambit (-10)” if Gambit wins the series by over 10 rounds, and “Entropiq (+10)” if Entropiq loses the series by less than 10 rounds (or wins). If the final round margin is exactly 10 rounds and favors Gambit, the market will resolve 50-50. Overtime rounds will be included. Note, this market pertains to the total round margin after the conclusion of the series (i.e. the sum of each completed game's round margin). If the series is postponed to a date on or before October 3, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the series is postponed to a date after October 3, 2021, or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50.

markets.question: Gambit (-10 rounds) v. Entropiq | September 4
